net.sf.mpxj.primavera

Class PrimaveraXERFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mpxj.reader.AbstractProjectReader
      • net.sf.mpxj.reader.AbstractProjectStreamReader
        • net.sf.mpxj.primavera.PrimaveraXERFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectReader

    public final class PrimaveraXERFileReader
extends AbstractProjectStreamReader
    This class creates a new ProjectFile instance by reading a Primavera XER file.

        public void setCharset(Charset charset)
        Alternative way to set the file encoding. If both an encoding name and a Charset instance are supplied, the Charset instance is used.
        Specified by:

      • readAll

        public List<ProjectFile> readAll(InputStream is)
                          throws MPXJException
        This is a convenience method which allows all projects in an XER file to be read in a single pass. External relationships are not linked.
        Parameters:
        is - input stream
        Returns:
        list of ProjectFile instances
        Throws:
        MPXJException

      • getMatchPrimaveraWBS

        public boolean getMatchPrimaveraWBS()
        If set to true, the WBS for each task read from Primavera will exactly match the WBS value shown in Primavera. If set to false, each task will be given a unique WBS based on the WBS present in Primavera. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        flag value

      • setMatchPrimaveraWBS

        public void setMatchPrimaveraWBS(boolean matchPrimaveraWBS)
        If set to true, the WBS for each task read from Primavera will exactly match the WBS value shown in Primavera. If set to false, each task will be given a unique WBS based on the WBS present in Primavera. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        matchPrimaveraWBS - flag value

      • getWbsIsFullPath

        public boolean getWbsIsFullPath()
        Returns true if the WBS attribute of a summary task contains a dot separated list representing the WBS hierarchy.
        Returns:
        true if WBS attribute is a hierarchy

      • setWbsIsFullPath

        public void setWbsIsFullPath(boolean wbsIsFullPath)
        Sets a flag indicating if the WBS attribute of a summary task contains a dot separated list representing the WBS hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        wbsIsFullPath - true if WBS attribute is a hierarchy
